original_text: The person who watches the gate opens it for the shepherd. The sheep recognize the shepherd's voice. He calls each of his own sheep by their name and he leads them out.
korean_text: 문지기는 그를 위하여 문을 열고 양은 그의 음성을 듣나니 그가 자기 양의 이름을 각각 불러 인도하여 내느니라

sentences.original_text: The person who watches the gate opens it
The sheep recognize the shepherd's voice
He calls each of his own sheep by their name
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 양 각각을 이름으로 부릅니다
